output:
The snow has melted away,
The flowers bloom so bright,
Birds singing everywhere,
This is the beauty of springtime delight.

The sun shines down with its warming ray,
The grass is gleaming green,
A pleasant breeze is blowing through,
A pleasant feeling can be seen.

The trees rain down the petals of the past,
A beautiful sign of the new season,
A fresh start that’s meant to last,
A beautiful feeling recalls the reason.

A warm season of joy,
A season that’s here to stay,
A season to ease our sorrow,
The season known as spring.
